taxon.author: (Kroneberg, 1875)
taxon.distribution: Eastern Africa to India and Indonesia, Caucasus to Central Asia and China. Introduced to Australia (Queensland)

referenceObject.reference: Kroneberg, A. (1875). Araneae. In: Fedtschenko, A. P. (ed.) Puteshestvie v Tourkestan. Reisen in Turkestan. Zoologischer Theil. Nachrichten der Gesellschaft der Freunde der Naturwissenschaften zu Moskau 19(3): 1-58, pl. 1-5.
